wikiedit-form-save: Label of the button to save the changes
wikiedit-form-cancel: Label of the button to cancel the edit
wikiedit-form-summary: Label of the field to enter the edit summary
wikiedit-form-minor: Label of the checkbox to mark the edit as minor
wikiedit-form-saving: Text shown while saving the changes
wikiedit-summary-edit: Edit summary when editing a paragraph
wikiedit-summary-delete: Edit summary when deleting a paragraph
